alert.note: Alert for Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 11:56PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Park and northwestern Teton Counties through 1245 AM MDT... At 1154 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fairy Falls, which is also near Old Faithful, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gibbons Falls around 1205 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
